member.name: T:RectpackSharp.PackingHints
member.summary: Specifies hints that help optimize the rectangle packing algorithm.

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingHints.TryByArea
member.summary: Tells the rectangle packer to try inserting the rectangles ordered by area.

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingHints.TryByPerimeter
member.summary: Tells the rectangle packer to try inserting the rectangles ordered by perimeter.

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingHints.TryByBiggerSide
member.summary: Tells the rectangle packer to try inserting the rectangles ordered by bigger side.

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingHints.TryByWidth
member.summary: Tells the rectangle packer to try inserting the rectangles ordered by width.

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingHints.TryByHeight
member.summary: Tells the rectangle packer to try inserting the rectangles ordered by height.

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingHints.TryByPathologicalMultiplier
member.summary: Tells the rectangle packer to try inserting the rectangles ordered by a pathological multiplier.

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingHints.FindBest
member.summary: Specifies to try all the possible hints, as to find the best packing configuration.

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingHints.UnusualSizes
member.summary: Specifies hints to optimize for rectangles who have one side much bigger than the other.

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingHints.MostlySquared
member.summary: Specifies hints to optimize for rectangles whose sides are relatively similar.

member.name: T:RectpackSharp.PackingHintExtensions
member.summary: Provides internal values and functions used by the rectangle packing algorithm.

member.name: T:RectpackSharp.PackingHintExtensions.GetSortKeyDelegate
member.summary: Represents a method for calculating a sort key from a .
member.param: The whose sort key to calculate.
member.returns: The value that should be assigned to .

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingHintExtensions.MaxHintCount
member.summary: The maximum amount of hints that can be specified by a .

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.PackingHintExtensions.GetFlagsFrom(RectpackSharp.PackingHints,System.Span{RectpackSharp.PackingHints}@)
member.summary: Separates a into the multiple options it contains, saving each of those separately onto a .
member.param: The to separate.
The span in which to write the resulting hints. This span's excess will be sliced.

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.PackingHintExtensions.SortByPackingHint(RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle[],RectpackSharp.PackingHints)
member.summary: Sorts the given array using the specified .
member.param: The rectangles to sort.
The hint to sort by. Must be a single bit value.

member.name: T:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle
member.summary: A rectangle that can be used for a rectangle packing operation.

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.Id
member.summary: A value that can be used to identify this . This value is never touched by the rectangle packing algorithm.

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.SortKey
member.summary: A value used internally by the packing algorithm for sorting rectangles.

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.X
member.summary: The X coordinate of the left edge of this .

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.Y
member.summary: The Y coordinate of the top edge of this .

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.Width
member.summary: The width of this .

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.Height
member.summary: The height of this .

member.name: P:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.Right
member.summary: Gets or sets the X coordinate of the right edge of this .
member.remarks: Setting this will only modify the .

member.name: P:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.Bottom
member.summary: Gets or sets the Y coordinate of the bottom edge of this .
member.remarks: Setting this will only modify the .

member.name: P:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.Area
member.summary: Calculates this 's area.

member.name: P:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.Perimeter
member.summary: Calculates this 's perimeter.

member.name: P:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.BiggerSide
member.summary: Gets this 's bigger side.

member.name: P:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.PathologicalMultiplier
member.summary: Calculates this 's pathological multiplier.
member.remarks: This is calculated as: max(width, height) / min(width, height) * width * height

member.summary: Creates a with the specified values.

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.#ctor(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a from a .

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.Contains(RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle@)
member.summary: Returns whether the given is contained entirely within this .

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.Intersects(RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle@)
member.summary: Returns whether the given intersects with this .

member.summary: Calculates the intersection of this with another.

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle.CompareTo(RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle)
member.summary: Compares this with another 's.

member.name: T:RectpackSharp.RectanglePacker
member.summary: A static class providing functionality for packing rectangles into a bin as small as possible.

member.name: F:RectpackSharp.RectanglePacker.oldListReference
member.summary: A weak reference to the last list used, so it can be reused in subsequent packs.

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.RectanglePacker.Pack(RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle[],RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle@,RectpackSharp.PackingHints,System.Single,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Finds a way to pack all the given rectangles into a single bin. Performance can be traded for space efficiency by using the optional parameters.
member.param: The rectangles to pack. The result is saved onto this array.
The bounds of the resulting bin. This will always be at X=Y=0.
Specifies hints for optimizing performance.
Searching stops once a bin is found with this density (usedArea/totalArea) or better.
The amount by which to increment/decrement size when trying to pack another bin.
member.remarks: The values are never touched. Use this to identify your rectangles.

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.RectanglePacker.TryFindBestBin(System.Collections.Generic.List{RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle},RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle[]@,RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle[]@,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle@)
member.summary: Tries to find a solution with the smallest bin size possible, packing the rectangles in the order in which the were provided.
member.param: The list of empty spaces for reusing.
The rectangles to pack. Might get swapped with "tmpArray".
A temporary array the function needs. Might get swapped with "rectangles".
The maximum bin size to try.
The amount by which to increment/decrement size when trying to pack another bin.
Stops searching once a bin with this area or less is found.
The bounds of the resulting bin (0, 0, width, height).

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.RectanglePacker.TryPackAsOrdered(System.Collections.Generic.List{RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle},System.Span{RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle},System.Span{RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle},System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32@,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Tries to pack the rectangles in the given order into a bin of the specified size.
member.param: The list of empty spaces for reusing.
The unpacked rectangles.
Where the resulting rectangles will be written.
The width of the bin.
The height of the bin.
The width of the resulting bin.
The height of the resulting bin.
member.remarks: The unpacked and packed spans can be the same.

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.RectanglePacker.TryFindBestSpace(RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle@,System.Collections.Generic.List{RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle},System.Int32@)
member.summary: Tries to find the best empty space that can fit the given rectangle.
member.param: The rectangle to find a space for.
The list with the empty spaces.
The index of the space found.
member.returns: Whether a suitable space was found.

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.RectanglePacker.GetList(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a list of rectangles that can be used for empty spaces.
member.param: If a list has to be created, this is used as initial capacity.

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.RectanglePacker.ReturnList(System.Collections.Generic.List{RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle})
member.summary: Returns a list so it can be used in future pack operations. The list should no longer be used after returned.

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.RectanglePacker.AddSorted(System.Collections.Generic.List{RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle},RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle)
member.summary: Adds a rectangle to the list in sorted order.

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.RectanglePacker.EnsureSorted(System.Collections.Generic.List{RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle},System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates an item's SortKey and ensures it is in the correct sorted position. If it's not, it is moved to the correct position.
member.remarks: If an item needs to be moved, it will only be moved forward. Never backwards.

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.RectanglePacker.CalculateTotalArea(System.ReadOnlySpan{RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle})
member.summary: Calculates the sum of the areas of all the given -s.

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.RectanglePacker.FindBounds(System.ReadOnlySpan{RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle})
member.summary: Calculates the smallest possible rectangle that contains all the given rectangles.

member.name: M:RectpackSharp.RectanglePacker.AnyIntersects(System.ReadOnlySpan{RectpackSharp.PackingRectangle})
member.summary: Returns true if any two different rectangles in the given span intersect.
